body_html: Well, I can now instantiate a TensorFlow! I get an error that says my cpu supports instructions that the TF was not compiled to use : AVX2. I’ll ignore like the internet says. Thanks for your help. Luke Hamm 806-535-4741 On May 24, 2018, at 12:13 PM, Armaan Puri <notifications@github.com<mailto:notifications@github.com>> wrote: Just download the base package, check if cudart64_90.dll is in the directory (should be in CUDA/v9.0/bin), once you see it there, ensure the directory is added to your PATH. Done. That's about as simple as it gets. — You are receiving this because you commented. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub<#17101 (comment)>, or mute the thread<https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AlraFRaru0yR9Ivdd93mw4fQEpYFeQhYks5t1upEgaJpZM4SJhYy>.
body_text:
Well, I can now instantiate a TensorFlow!

I get an error that says my cpu supports instructions that the TF was not compiled to use : AVX2.

I’ll ignore like the internet says.

Thanks for your help.

Luke Hamm
806-535-4741

On May 24, 2018, at 12:13 PM, Armaan Puri <notifications@github.com<mailto:notifications@github.com>> wrote:


Just download the base package, check if cudart64_90.dll is in the directory (should be in CUDA/v9.0/bin), once you see it there, ensure the directory is added to your PATH. Done. That's about as simple as it gets.

—
You are receiving this because you commented.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub<#17101 (comment)>, or mute the thread<https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AlraFRaru0yR9Ivdd93mw4fQEpYFeQhYks5t1upEgaJpZM4SJhYy>.
body:
Well, I can now instantiate a TensorFlow!

I get an error that says my cpu supports instructions that the TF was not compiled to use : AVX2.

I’ll ignore like the internet says.

Thanks for your help.

Luke Hamm
806-535-4741

On May 24, 2018, at 12:13 PM, Armaan Puri <notifications@github.com<mailto:notifications@github.com>> wrote:


Just download the base package, check if cudart64_90.dll is in the directory (should be in CUDA/v9.0/bin), once you see it there, ensure the directory is added to your PATH. Done. That's about as simple as it gets.

—
You are receiving this because you commented.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub<https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/17101#issuecomment-391790328>, or mute the thread<https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AlraFRaru0yR9Ivdd93mw4fQEpYFeQhYks5t1upEgaJpZM4SJhYy>.
